text: Briareum violaceum, commonly called star polyp, is a species of a soft coral in the family Briareidae.van Ofwegen, L. (2010). Briareum violaceum (Quoy & Gaimard, 1833). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=517640 on 2011-01-07 == See also == * Phyllodesmium briareum ==References== Category:Alcyonacea Category:Corals described in 1833
title: Briareum violaceum
